And it was not from that incident that our mutual affection sprang ; no, it was of long standing and strong, and that was the reason why there was no risk he hesitated to run on my behalf. To these kindnesses, or rather most acceptable services, are added the bonds of constant intimacy, so that there is absolutely nobody in the world who attracts me more.
